preset_modes: 24 preset modes (e.g. low light, beach, sports)
sensor_size: 23.5mm x 15.6mm [APS-C] X-Trans CMOS III with primary color filter

effects: 17 glamor retouch effects (toy camera, lighter or darker skin tones, skin softening, etc.)
